channel.title: I really want to play this! but
channel.description: i enter everything but it stil says error connecting to server! what should i do? [br][size=1]Posted at: July 12, 2006, 11:20:34 AM[/size][hr]HELP!!!!!! PLZ SOMEONE MUST KNOW!

item.title: I really want to play this! but
item.dc:creator: @hello_to_you_all hello to you all
item.description:
@hello_to_you_all wrote:

oooo well maybe if he asked the right questions and make it detailed more people could help him

but yeah i get the exact sort of problem…

mine keeps saying connection lost… reconnecting to server… over and over again

item.title: I really want to play this! but
item.dc:creator: @james james
item.description:
@james wrote:

[quote=“hello to you all, post:2, topic:4765”]well mate runescape have been having alot of problems recently!

i think ull find that alot of people are suffering from the lagging and lost connections etc from the server theres not much u can really do except wait and hope runescape fix the problem![/quote]

dont think hes talking about runescape…

try getting a reliable ip such as rs3.no-ip.org

type that into ur adress bar and register for the server and wa-la

Read full topic
